Text:
Decent  ad for the program...
but no crack :( i rather not pay $10
A crack isn't possible, and if it is, I challenge someone to create one. A serial would have been leaked, but they are quick to pera-ban an account for sharing licenses.

Then you definitely don't want to spend $25 on current version 0.1.7.9.

But speaking of cracks ... You do know that right now, at this moment, version 0.1.7.9 can rip ALL images and some/all videos from ANY private Photobucket album. Right? It even provides an exploit to retrieve guest passwords from albums that have a guest password set.

Other people with access to tricks like this either don't share at all or they sell rips for something crazy like $5/bucket. Unlimited rips for $25 seemed pretty fair.

I wouldn't buy this if I were you, I tried it out twice and the passwords delete so it tricks you into trying to buy it again if you uninstall it. Your registration code becomes "invalid" and you lose your money.
